DOC.brief_summary: Forty-eight female patients will be randomized into three groups to receive the Kinesio taping, placebo Kinesio taping and control group. The group Kinesio taping receive the correct application of the method described. The placebo group will receive a placement without tension. The control group did not receive any form of intervention.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of the Kinesio TapingÂ® in Muscle Activation
DOC.detailed_description: The group Kinesio taping receive the correct application of the method described with tension of 40%. The placebo group will receive a placement without tension. The control group did not receive any form of intervention.
DOC.criteria: Woman Sedentary Physically active, pain men musculoskeletal injury in the last six months.
